attributes.action: Give Daniel Kahn a Knighthood or at least an MBE for his services to the Jaffa Cake industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I (Daniel Kahn) have eaten lots and lots of Jaffa Cakes in my time and I feel it is about time that my contribution to helping the growth in popularity of this most British of foods is recognised.  Thanks for your time

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
